us.phonetic: /pɚˈtɪkjəlɚli, pəˈtɪk-/, (pər tik′yə lər lē, pə tik′-)

example.eg: Be particularly careful when driving in icy conditions.
example.egtrans: 在冰上驾驶时，要特别小心。

us.phonetic: /pɚˈtɪkjəlɚli, pəˈtɪk-/, (pər tik′yə lər lē, pə tik′-)

example.eg: He did well in his examinations - particularly in French.
The head teacher praised each child particularly, one by one.
A proofreader must be particularly attentive to detail.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 非常仔细地, 详细地
